items.sentence: It\'s possible that we won\'t be able to get to Boston in time for the wedding.
She sold all of her furniture, so she could afford to feed herself and her dog.
In spite of his tight schedule, Tom always has time to spend with his children.
My father is a native French speaker and my mother is a native English speaker.
Tom continued reading the newspaper even though the burglar alarm had gone off.
I remember when we used to never eat vegetables that we didn\'t grow ourselves.
I don\'t know any of Tom\'s brothers. I don\'t know any of his sisters, either.
When you\'re speaking with your classmates, what language do you usually speak?
Tom is so old that even the oldest in the village first knew him as an old man.
Tom knew that he should study French every day if he really wanted to learn it.
Tom lost his job because the firm decided that a robot could do his job better.
Tom doesn\'t swim, but he likes sitting by the pool watching his children swim.
Why don\'t you guys go on into the living room and make yourselves comfortable?
All Tom wanted was to find a woman who would accept all the love he could give.
I\'m sure Tom will come back as soon as he realizes he left his briefcase here.
Tom seemed quite surprised when he heard that Mary and John had gotten married.
My usual drink is apple juice with mineral water, but I also like orange juice.
Tom and Mary will be celebrating their thirtieth wedding anniversary on Monday.
Tom apologized to the families of the victims for the explosion at the factory.
Tom wanted Mary to pose in the nude for his painting, but she refused to do so.
